share.title: Share Checklist

share.noActiveInvites: No active invites. Generate a link to share this checklist.
share.inviteLinkCopiedDescription: The invite link has been copied to your clipboard.
share.copyFailed: Copy failed - here is your link:

toast.leftChecklistDescription: You have successfully left the shared checklist

confirm.deleteChecklist: Are you sure you want to delete this checklist? This action cannot be undone.
confirm.leaveChecklist: Are you sure you want to leave this shared checklist? You can rejoin using the invite link.
